## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G32430](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G32430)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>GRS1</u>
- **Gene Name:** Growing slowly 1
- **Description:**   Pentatricopeptide repeat (PPR) superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2127801
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [grs1-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Homozygotes are slow growing and must be grown on MS media. They are sterile with defects in both male and female fertility.
